content: I've been meaning to organize my contacts for a while now, so thanks for the tips! I'll definitely start going through my list and merging duplicates, adding notes, and removing unknown contacts. One thing I've also been meaning to do is get a new screen cleaner. I've been using a microfiber cloth, but it's not doing a great job. I saw an ad for a screen cleaning solution that's supposed to be really effective, so I might pick that up this weekend. Do you have any recommendations for good screen cleaners or cleaning solutions?
